mapper.select: select no, title, contents as content, hit, reg_date as registerDate, g_no as gNo, o_no as oNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board order by g_no DESC, o_no ASC limit 5 offset #{offset }
select no, title, contents as content, hit, reg_date as registerDate, g_no as gNo, o_no as oNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board order by g_no DESC, o_no ASC

choose.when: insert into board values(null, #{title }, #{content }, 0, now(), IFNULL((select max(b.g_no) from board b),0)+1, ${oNo }, ${depth }, ${userNo })

mapper.select: select no, title, contents as content, g_no as gNo, o_no as oNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board where no=${no }
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where no=${no }
update board set o_no=o_no+1 where g_no=${gNo } and o_no!=0 and o_no >= ${oNo }
update board set title=${title }, contents=${content } where no=${no }
